summary: Removes your bounty from every city you it.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]INSTALLATION

[/size]Copy/Cut to your Skyrim folder.
For example: (local disk)\Program Files(x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim.

[size=4]ACTIVATION

[/size]In-Game, follow these steps:

[color=#00ff00]Step 1. [/color]Open the console using the ~ button, which is to the left of the 1/! button, and above the Tab button.

[color=#00ff00]Step 2. [/color]Left click on a guard or sometimes even a citizen that is associated with the bounty (For example, if you have bounty in Whiterun, Left click on a Whiterun guard or on Ysolda cause why not?).

[color=#00ff00]Step 3.[/color] Type: bat bounty.Â 

[color=#00ff00]Step 4.[/color] The game will automatically pay for the bounty, even if in game it is not possible.

[size=4]EXTRA NOTES
[/size]
This mod works as well if you've chosen the Stormcloaks's side in the CIvil War.

To make a file, so you can type in console the bat command. You just need to create a .txt file, write inside it the commands you want to be executed in game. And save it inside your Skyrim/Data folder.
Hope this help you [b][color=#ffff00]:)[/color][/b]
author: SpooderSwag

files.name: Main file- Works with Dragonborn DLC (DB not required)
